item.title: TIL: Indexing `NULL` in Oracle Database
item.description: Oracle database does not index a row if all the indexed columns are NULL For instance, let say we have a users table where we index role column to improve the query performance. SELECT * from users WHERE role IS NULL The index does not work for such query in Oracle database.
